mapper.select: select table_name tableName, engine, table_comment tableComment, create_time createTime from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database())

select column_name columnName, data_type dataType, column_comment columnComment, column_key columnKey, extra ,is_nullable as isNullable,column_type as columnType from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position
